thread.title: Girlfriend mourns slain boyfriend shot at Florida's Zombicon
thread.title_full: Girlfriend mourns slain boyfriend shot at Florida's Zombicon - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Girlfriend mourns slain boyfriend shot at Florida's Zombicon
text:
Melissa Montoya-Ocampo/The News-Press via AP First responders tend to a person at the scene of shooting outside ZombiCon in Fort Myers, Fla., on Saturday night. A couple at the edge of Zombicon’s revelry had barely an hour to enjoy the Florida street festival before gunfire erupted, killing Expavious Taylor, the victim’s girlfriend recalled of Saturday’s horrifying shooting.
The 20-year-old aspiring mortician wearing a clown mask, and his girlfriend, Jasmine Gaure, never saw the shooter. Their backs were turned while waiting for drinks, but she heard the bullets rip and immediately dropped to the ground.
"We just were standing there and then we heard the shots, and then we all got down," 26-year-old Gaure told the Fort Myers News-Press . “When we all picked our heads up to check on each other, we saw him lying there on the sidewalk."
The sound of gunfire at 11:45 p.m. sent hundreds of panicked dancers and concertgoers at the evening’s packed zombie-themed event — some masked and even costumed like the living the dead — fleeing for their lives .
Some attendees hid on the ground inside businesses, refusing to come out until they knew for certain it was safe, the Naples Daily News reported .
